mantras.content: Om Aakashaay Cha Vidmahe Nabho Devaay Dheemahi Tanno Gaganam Prachodayat
mantras.title: Aakash Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Alasasya Kutah Vidya,
Avidyasya Kutah Dhanam ।
Adhanasya Kutah Mitram,
Amitrasya Kutah Sukham ॥
mantras.title: Alasasya Kutah Vidya Mantra

mantras.content:
Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Atma Rama Aananda Ramana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vandita Charana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vandita Charana
Raghukula Bhushana Raajeeva Lochana
Raghukula Bhushana Raajeeva Lochana

Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Atma Rama Aananda Ramana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana

Aadhi Naaraayana Aananta Shayana
Aadhi Naaraayana Aananta Shayana
Sachidananda Sri Sathya Naaraayana
Sachidananda Sri Sathya Naaraayana

Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
Atma Rama Aananda Ramana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana
Acchutha Kesava Hari Narayana
mantras.title: Atma Rama Ananda Ramana Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Bhootadipaay Vidmahe Mahadevay Dheemahi Tanno Shastha Prachodayat

Om Bhootadipaay Vidmahe Bhaw Putraya Dheemahi Tanno Shastha Prachodayat

Om Bhootadipaay Vidmahe Bhaw Nandanaay Dheemahi Tanno Shastha Prachodayat
mantras.title: Ayyappa Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ।
Nammamm Ni Saubhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥
Hejjey Mele Hejjeyanikkut
Gejje Kalgal Dhvaniy Torut ।
Sajjan Sadhu Poojey Velege
Majjigeyolagin Benneyante ॥

Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥

Kanak Vrshtiy Kareyut Baare
Manakamaney Siddhiy Tore ।
Dinakar Koti Tejadi Holeyuv
Janakarayan Kumari Beg ॥

Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥

Attittalagade Bhaktar Maneyali
Nity Mahotsav Nity Sumangal ।
Satyav Toruv Saadhu Sajjanar
Chittadi Holeyuv Putthali Bombe ॥

Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥

Sankhyayillad Bhagyav Kottu
Kankan Kaiy Tiruvut Baare ।
Kukkumkitek Pankaj Lochne
Venkataramanan Binkad Raani ॥

Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥

Sakkare Tuppad Kaaluve Harisi
Shukravarad Poojey Velege ।
Akkareyule Agiri Rangan
Chokk Purandar Vitthalan Rani ॥
Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥

Bhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ।
Nammamm Ni Saubhagyad Lakshmi Baaramma ॥
mantras.title: Bhagyada Lakshmi Baaramma Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Vedatmane Vidmahe Hiranyagarbhay Dhimahi Tanno Brahma Prachodayat

Om Chaturmukhay Vidmahe Kamandalu Dharay Dhimahi Tanno brahma Prachodayat

Om Parmeshwrayay Vidmahe partatway Dhimahi Tanno Brahma Prachodayat

Om Tatpurushay Vidmahe Chaturmukhay Dhimahi Tanno Brahma Prachodayat
mantras.title: Brahma Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Buddham Saranam Gacchami।
Dhammam Saranam Gacchami।
Sangham Saranam Gacchami।
mantras.title: Buddham Saranam Gachami Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Somyarupay Vidmahe Waneshay Dheemahi Tanno Somya Prachodayat

Om Gajdhwajay Vidmahe Sukhhastaay Dheemahi Tanno Budhah Prachodayat

Om Chandraputray Vidmahe Rohini Priyay Dheemahi Tanno Budhah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Budh Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Amritgangaay Vidmahe Kalarupaay Dheemahi Tanno Som Prachodayat

Om Kshirputraay Vidmahe Amrittatwaay Dheemahi Tanno Chandra Prachodayat
mantras.title: Chandra Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Dakshinamurtye Vidmahe Dhyanasthaay Dheemahi Tanno Dhishah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Dakshinamurthy Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Digambaray Vidmahe Avdhutaay Dheemahi Tanno Datta Prachodayat
mantras.title: Datta Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Subham Karoti Kalyanam Arogyam Dhana Sampadah
Shatru Buddhi Vinashaya Deepa Jyoti Namostute

Deepajyothi Parabrahma Deepajyothi Janardhana
Deepo Me Hara Tu Paapam Sandhya Deepa Namostute
mantras.title: Deep Prajwalan Darshan Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Gurudevaay Vidmahe Parbrahmaay Dheemahi Tanno Guru Prachodayat
Om VrishabhDhwajay Vidmahe Karunihastaay Dheemahi Tanno Guru Prachodayat

Om Angirsaay Vidmahe Divyadehaay Dheemahi Tanno Jivah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Dev Guru Brihaspati Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Tatpurushay Vidmahe Amrita Kalasha Hasthaay Dheemahi Tanno Dhanvantari Prachodayat

Om Vasudevay Vidmahe Vaidhya Rajay Dheemahi Tanno Dhanvantari Prachodayat

Om Amud Hasthay Vidmahe Aarogya Anugrahay Dheemahi Tanno Dhanvantri Prachodayat
mantras.title: Dhanvantari Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Pratham Pushpanjali Mantra:
Om Jayanti, Mangala, Kali, Bhadrakali, Kapalini।
Durga, Shiva, Kshama, Dhatri, Svaha, Svadha Namostu Te॥
Esha Sachandana Gandha Pushpa Bilva Patranjali Om Hreem Durgayai Namah॥

Dwitiya Pushpanjali Mantra:
Om Mahishaghni Mahamaye Chamunde Mundamalini।
Ayurarogyavijayam Dehi Devi Namostu Te॥
Esha Sachandana Gandha Pushpa Bilva Patranjali Om Hreem Durgayai Namah॥


Tritiya Pushpanjali Mantra:
Om Sarva Mangala Mangalye Shive Sarvartha Sadhike।
Sharanye Tryambake Gauri Narayani Namostu Te॥1॥

Srishti Sthiti Vinashanam, Shaktibhute, Sanatani।
Gunashraye, Gunamaye, Narayani, Namostu Te॥2॥

Sharanagata Dinarta Paritrana Parayane।
Sarvasyartihare Devi! Narayani! Namostu Te॥3॥
mantras.title: Durga Puja Pushpanjali Mantra

mantras.content:
Gajananam Bhoota Ganadi Sevitam,
Kapittha Jammbu Phala Charu Bhakshanam ।
Umasutam Shoka Vinasha karakam,
Namami Vighneshwara Pada Pankajam ॥
mantras.title: Gajananam Bhoota Ganadhi Sevitam Mantra

mantras.content:
Ganayakaya Ganadevatay Ganadhyakshaya Dhimahi ।
Gunasharaya Gunamanditay Guneshanay Dhimahi ।
Gunatitay Gunadhishay Gunapravishtay Dhimahi ।
Ekadantaya Vakratundaya Gauritanaya Dhimahi ।
Gajeshanay Bhalchandraya Shri Ganeshaya Dhimahi ॥
Ganachaturay Ganapranay Ganantaratmane,
Ganotsukay Ganamattay Ganotsukamanase ।
Gurupoojitay Gurudevatay Gurukulasthayine,
Guruvikramay Guhyapravaray Gurave Gunagurave ।
Gurudaityagalachchhetre Gurudharmasadaradhyay,
Guruputraparitratre Gurupakhandakhandakay ।
Geetsarai Geetattvay Geetgotraya Dhimahi,
Gudhagulphay Gandhamattaya Gojayapradaya Dhimahi ।
Gunatitaya Gunadhishay Gunapravishtay Dhimahi,
Ekadantaya Vakratundaya Gauritanaya Dhimahi ।
Gajeshanay Bhalchandraya Shri Ganeshaya Dhimahi ॥

Granthagitay Granthageyay Granthantaratmane,
Geetaleenay Geetashrayay Geetavadyapatave ।
Geyacharitaay Gayakavaraay Gandharvapriyakrte,
Gayakadhinavigrahay Gangajalapranayavate ।
Gauristanandhayay Gaurihridayanandanay,
Gaurabhanusutay Gauriganeshvaray ।
Gauripranay Gauripravanay Gaurbhavaay Dhimahi,
Gosahasray Govardhanaya Gopagopay Dhimahi ।
Gunatitaya Gunadhishay Gunapravishtay Dhimahi,
Ekadantaya Vakratundaya Gauritanaya Dhimahi ।
Gajeshanay Bhalchandraya Shri Ganeshaya Dhimahi ॥
mantras.title: Gananaykay Gandevatay Ganadhyakshay Dheemahi

mantras.content:
Om Shreem Gam Saubhagya Ganpataye ।
Varvarda Sarvajanma Mein Vashamanya Namah ॥
mantras.title: Ganesha Shubh Labh Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Tatpurushay Vidmahe Suvarnpakshaay Dheemahi Tanno Garudah Prachodayat ||

Om PakshiRajay Vidmahe Pakshidevaay Dheemahi Tanno Pakshi Prachodayat ||
mantras.title: Garuda Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Gauri Nandana Gajanana
Gauri Nandana Gajanana
Girija Nandana Niranjanaa
Girija Nandana Niranjanaa
Parvati Nandana Shubhananaa
Parvati Nandana Shubhananaa
Shubhananaa Shubhananaa
Shubhananaa Shubhananaa
Pahi Prabhomaam Pahi Prasanna
Pahi Prabhomaam Pahi Prasanna ॥
Gauri Nandana Gajanana
Gauri Nandana Gajanana
Girija Nandana Niranjanaa
Girija Nandana Niranjanaa
Parvati Nandana Shubhananaa
Parvati Nandana Shubhananaa
Shubhananaa Shubhananaa
Shubhananaa Shubhananaa
Pahi Prabhomaam Pahi Prasanna
Pahi Prabhomaam Pahi Prasanna ॥
mantras.title: Gauri Nandana Gajanana Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Bhurbhuvah Swah
Tatsaviturvarenyam
Bhargo Devasya Dhimahi
Dhiyo Yo Nah Prachodayat ॥
mantras.title: Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Param Hansay Vidmahe Maha Hansay Dheemahi Tanno Hansa Prachodayat
mantras.title: Hansa Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
om namo bajar ka kotha,
jis par pind hamaara petha,
ishvar kunji brahm ka taala,
hamaare aatho aamo ka jati hanumant rakhavaala
mantras.title: Hanuman Shabar Raksha Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Wagishwaray Vidmahe Hayagrivay Dheemahi Tanno Hansah Prachodayat

Om Wanishwaray Vidmahe Haygriva Dheemahi Tanno Hayagriva Prachodayat
mantras.title: Hayagriva Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Sahastranetraay Vidmahe Vajra Hastaay Dheemahi Tanno Indrah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Indra Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Jai Durge Jai Durge,
Mahishvimardini Jai Durge ।
Jai Durge Jai Durge,
Mahishavimardini Jai Durge ।
Mangalkarini Jai Durge,
Jagajjanani Jai Jai Durge ।
Mangalkarini Jai Durge,
Jagajjanani Jai Jai Durge ॥

Veenapanini Pustakadharini,
Amba Jai Jai Vaani ।
Jagadmba Jai Jai Vaani ॥

Veenapanini Pustakdharini,
Amba Jai Jai Vaani ।
Jagdamba Jai Jai Vaani ॥

Vedroopini Samagayani,
Amba Jai Jai Vaani ।
Jagdamba Jai Jai Vaani ॥

Vedaroopini Samagayani,
Amba Jai Jai Vaani ।
Jagdamba Jai Jai Vaani ॥
mantras.title: Jaya Durge Daya Durge - Mantra

mantras.content:
Kaak Cheshta, Bako Dhyanam,
Swan Nindra Tathaiwa Cha।
Alpahari, Grihtyaagi,
Vidyarthi Panch Lakshnam॥
mantras.title: Kaak Cheshta Vidyarthee Ke Panch

mantras.content:
Om Kamdevay Vidmahe Pushp Wanay Dheemahi Tanno Anang Prachodayat |
Om Kamdevay Vidmahe Rati Priyaye Dheemahi Tanno Anang Prachodayat ||
mantras.title: Kamdev Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Kara-Charanna Kratam Vaak-Kaaya-Jam Karma-Jam Vaa ।
Shravanna-Nayana-Jam Vaa Maanasam Va-Aparaadham ।
Vihitam-Avihitam Vaa Sarvam-Etat-Kssamasva ।
Jaya Jaya Karunna-Abdhe Shrii-Mahaadeva Shambho ॥
mantras.title: Karacharana Kritam Vaa Mantra

mantras.content:
KarpuuraGauram KarunaAvataram,
Sansara-Saram BhujagendraHaram।
SadaVasantam HradayaAravinde,
Bhavam BhawaneeSahitam Namami॥
mantras.title: Karpura Gauram Karuna Avataram Mantra

mantras.content:
Om PadamPutraay Vidmahe Amriteshaay Dheemahi Tanno Ketu Prachodayat

Om Ashwadhwajaay Vidmahe Shulahastaay Dheemahi Tanno Ketu Prachodayat

Om Gadahastaay Vidmahe Amriteshaay Dheemahi Tannah Ketu Prachodayat
mantras.title: Ketu Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Krodhad Bhavati Sammohah Sammohat Smriti-vibhramah।
Smriti-bhranshad Buddhi-nasho Buddhi-nashat Pranashyati।।
mantras.title: Krodhad Bhavati Sammohah Mantra

mantras.content: Om Bhagwatae Cha Vidmahe Maheshwaryae Cha Dheemahi Tannoannapurna Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Annapurna Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Mahadewyae Widmahe Durgayae Dhimahi Tanno Devi Prachodayat

Om Katyaynyae Widmahe Kanykumayre Cha Dhimahi Tanno Durga Prachodayat

Om Girijay Cha Widmahe Shivpriyay Cha Dhimahi Tanno Durga Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Durga Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Kalikae Cha Vidmahe Shamshanwasinyae Dheemahi Tanno Kali Prachodayat

Om Kalikayae Cha Vidmahe Shamshanwasinyae Dheemahi Tanno Aghora Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Kali Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Shri Mahalakshmyae Cha Widmahe Vishnu Patnyae Cha Dhimahi Tanno Lakshmi Prachodayat Om ||
mantras.title: Maa Lakshmi Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Wagdaivyai Cha Vidmahe Kamrajay Dheemahi Tanno Devi Prachodayat

Om Saraswatyae Vidmahe Brahmputriyae Dheemahi Tanno Devi Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Saraswati Mantra

mantras.content: Om Sarvsanmohinyae Vidmahe Vishwajananyae Dheemahi tanno Shakti Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Shakti Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Janaknandinyae Vidmahe Bhumijaayae Dheemahi tanno Sita Prachodayat
mantras.title: Maa Sita Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Trimbak Yajamhe
Sugandhi Puthivivradhanam ।
Urvorukmiv Bandhanan
Mrtyormukshiy Mamratat ॥
mantras.title: Mahamrityunjay Mantra

mantras.content: Om Angarkay Vidmahe Shaktihastaay Dheemahi Tanno Bhomah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Mangal Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Bhagwan Vishnu Mulmantra
Om Namoh Narayanaya॥

Vishnu Bhagwate Vasudevaya Mantra
Om Namoh Bhagawate Vasudevaya॥

Vishnu Gayatri Mantra
Om Shri Vishnave Cha Vidmahe Vasudevaya Dhimahi।
Tanno Vishnuh Prachodayat॥

Vishnu Shantakaram Mantra
Shantakaram Bhujagashayanam Padmanabham Suresham
Vishvadharam Gaganasadrisham Meghavarnam Shubhangam।
Lakshmikantam Kamalanayanam Yogibhirdhyanagamyam
Vande Vishnum Bhavabhayaharam Sarvalokaikanatham॥

Mangalam Bhagwan Vishnu Mantra
Mangalam Bhagwan Vishnuh, Mangalam Garunadhwajah।
Mangalam Pundari Kakshah, Mangalaya Tano Harih॥
mantras.title: Mangalam Bhagwan Vishnu-Shri Vishnu Mantra

mantras.content:
Achyuta Ananta Govinda ।

Om Achyutaya Namaha ॥
Om Anantaya Namaha ॥
Om Govindaya Namaha ॥
mantras.title: Nama Traya Astra Mantra

mantras.content:
Namokar Mantra Hai Nyara, Isane Lakhon Ko Tara।
Is Maha Mantra Ka Jaap Karo, Bhav Jal Se Mile Kinara।
mantras.title: Namokar Maha Mantra

mantras.content: Om Tatpurushay Vidmahe Chakratunday Dheemahi Tanno Nandih Prachodayat
mantras.title: Nandi Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Asato Ma Sadgamaya ।
Tamaso Ma Jyotirgamaya ।
Mrityorma Amritamgamaya ।
Om Shantih Shantih Shantih ॥
mantras.title: Om Asato Maa Sadgamaya - Pavman Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Mahalakshmayai Namah
Om Mahalakshmayai Namah
Om Mahalakshmayai Namah
Om Mahalakshmayai Namah
Om Mahalakshmayai Namah
Mahalakshmayai Namah
Mahalakshmayai Namah
Mahalakshmayai Namah

Om Mahalakshmei Namo Namah Jaap


Om Mahalakshmei Namo Namah
Vishnu Priyayei Namo Namah
Om Dhanpradayei Namo Namah
Vishwa Jananyei Namo Namah


Om Mahalakshmei Namo Namah
Vishnu Priyayei Namo Namah
Om Dhanpradayei Namo Namah
Vishwa Jananyei Namo Namah
mantras.title: Om Mahalaxmi Namoh Namah - Malakshmi Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Sarve Bhavantu Sukhinah।
Sarve Santu Nir-Aamayaah।
Sarve Bhadraanni Pashyantu।
Maa Kashcid-Duhkha-Bhaag-Bhavet॥
Om Shaantih Shaantih Shaantih॥
mantras.title: Om Sarve Bhavantu Sukhinaha Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Sarveshaam Svastir-Bhavatu ।
Sarveshaam Shaantir-Bhavatu ।
Sarveshaam Purnnam-Bhavatu ।
Sarveshaam Manggalam-Bhavatu ।
Om Shaantih Shaantih Shaantih ॥
mantras.title: Om Sarvesham Svastir Bhavatu Mantra

mantras.content:
Jaya Sri-Krishna-Chaitanya Prabhu Nityananda |
Sri-Advaita Gadadhara Srivasadi-Gaura-Bhakta-Vrind ||
mantras.title: Panch Tattva Pranam Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Hanumate Namah॥

Hang Hanumate Rudraatmakaay Hung Phatt॥

Om Anjaneyaya Vidmahe Vayuputraya Dhimahi।
Tanno Hanumat Prachodayat॥

Om Shree Vajradehaya Ramabhakthaya Vayuputhraya Namosthuthe॥

Manojavam Marutatulyavegam Jitendriyam Buddhimatam Varishtham।
Vatatmajam Vanarayuthamukhyam Shriramadutam Sharanam Prapadye॥

Anjanii-Garbha Sambhuuta Kapii-Indra Sacivo Uttama।
Raama-Priya Namas-Tubhyam Hanuman Rakssa Sarvadaa ॥

Aum Aeem Bhreem Hanumate
Shree Ram Dootaaya Namaha॥
mantras.title: Powerful Hanuman Mantra

mantras.content:
Karagre Vasate Lakssmih Karamadhye Sarasvati।
Karamuule Tu Govindah Prabhaate Karadarshanam॥
Samudravasane Devi! Paravatstanmandale।
Vishnupatni! Namstubhyam Padsparsham Kshamasva Me॥

Brahmaa Muraaris-Tripuraantakaarii
Bhaanuh Shashii Bhuumisuto Budhash-Ca।
Gurush-Ca Shukrah Shani-Raahu-Ketavah
Kurvantu Sarve Mama Suprabhaatam॥

Sanatkumaarah Sanakah Sanandanah
Sanaatano[a-A]pyi-Aasuri-Pinggalau Ca।
Sapta Svaraah Sapta Rasaatalaani
Kurvantu Sarve Mama Suprabhaatam॥

Sapta-arnnavaah Sapta Kula-Acalaash-Ca
Sapta-Rssayo Dviipa-Aanaani Sapta।
Bhuur-Aadi-Krtvaa Bhuvanaani Sapta
Kurvantu Sarve Mama Suprabhaatam॥

Prthvii Sa-Gandhaa Sa-Rasaas-Tatha-Apah
Sparshii Ca Vaayur-Jvalitam Ca Tejah।
Nabhah Sa-Shabdam Mahataa Sahaia-Eva
Kurvantu Sarve Mama Suprabhaatam॥

Pratah smaranamtada yo
viditvassdaratah Pathet
Sa samyaga dharmanishthah Syat
sansmrtasakhanda bharatah॥
mantras.title: Pratah Smaran Dainik Upasana Shlok

mantras.content:
Prathame Narjita Vidya,
Dvitiye Narjitam Dhanam ।
Trtiye Narjitam Punyam,
Caturthe Kim Karisyati ॥
mantras.title: Prathame Narjita Vidya

mantras.content: Om Prithvi Devyae Vidmahe Sahastra Murtyae Dheemahi Tanno Prithvi Prachodayat
mantras.title: Prithvi Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Vrishbhanujaay Vidmahe KrishnaPriyaay Dheemahi Tanno Radha Prachodayat ||
mantras.title: Radha Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om ShiroRupaay Vidmahe Amriteshaay Dheemahi Tanno Rahu Prachodayat

Om Nakadhwajaay Vidmahe Padmahastaay Dheemahi Tanno Rahu Prachodayat

Om Nilwarnaay Vidmahe Sainhikeyay Dheemahi Tanno Rahu Prachodayat
mantras.title: Rahu Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Ram Raameti Raameti, Rame Raame Manorame ।
Sahasra-Nama Tat-Tulyam, Raama-Naama Varanane ॥
mantras.title: Ram Raameti Raameti - Shri Ram Mantra

mantras.content:
Udbhoot-Bheeshan-Jalodar-Bhaar-Bhugnaah,
Shochyam Dasha-Mupagatash-Chyut-Jeevitashah ।
Tvatpaad-Pankaj-Rajo-Mrat-Digdh-Dehaah,
Martya Bhawanti Makar-Dhwaj-Tulya-Roopah ॥
mantras.title: Sarv Bhayanak Rog Nashak Mantra

mantras.content:
Saurastre Somanatha Cha Srishaile Mallikarjunam ।
Ujjayinyam Mahakalamomkarammaleswaram ॥ 1 ॥
Paralya Vaidyanatham Cha Dakkinam Bhimashankaram ।
Setubandhe Tu Ramesham Nagesham Darukavane ॥ 2 ॥

Varansyam Tu Vishwesham Trimbakam Gautamitate ।
Himalaye Tu Kedaram Ghushmesham Cha Shivalaye ॥ 3 ॥

Etani Jyotirlingani Saayam Pratah Pathennarah ।
Saptajanmakritam Papam Smarnen Binasyati ॥ 4 ॥
mantras.title: Saurashtre Somanathan - Dwadas Jyotirlingani Mantra

mantras.content:
Seetha Kalyaana Vaibhogame
Rama Kalyaana Vaibhogame
Pavanaja Sthuthi Paathra Paavana Charithra
Ravi Soma Vara Nethra Ramaneeya Gatra

Bhaktha Jana Paripala Bharitha Sara Jaala
Bhukthi Mukthitha Leela Bhudeva Paala

Paamarasura Bheema Paripoorna Kaama
Syaama Jagathabiraama Saaketha Dhaama

Sarvalokaa Dhaara Samaraika Veera
Garva Maanasa Dura Kanakaaga Dheera

Nigamagama Vihaara Nirupama Shareera
Naga Daragha Vidhara Nataloka Dhaara

Paramesha Nutha Geetha Bhava Jaladhi Potha
Tharani Kula Sanchata Thyagaraja Nutha
mantras.title: Seetha Kalyana Vaibhogame

mantras.content:
Om Shanicharya Namah

Om Bhag Bhavaay Vidmahe Mrityu Rupaay Dheemahi Tanno Shourihi Prachodayat

Om Surya Putray Vidmahe Mrityu Rupaay Dheemahi Tanno Shourihi Prachodayat

Om Kaakdhwajaay Vidmahe Khadag hastaay Dheemahi tanno Mandah Prachodayat

Om Shanescharaay Vidmahe ChayaPutraay Dheemahi Tanno Mandah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Shani Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content: Om Panch Janyay Vidmahe Padm Garbhay Dheemahi Tanno Shankhah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Shankh Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Twampura Sagarotpann Vishnunavighrtahkare ।
Devaishchapujitah Sarvathaupachchajanyamanostute ॥
mantras.title: Shankh Poojan Mantra

mantras.content: Om Tatpurushaya Vidhmahe Maha Senaya Dheemahi Thannoh Shanmukha Prachodhayat ||
mantras.title: Shanmukha Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Dyau Shanti-Rantariksha-Gwam Shantih,
Prithvi Shanti-Rapah Shanti-Roshadhayah Shantih ।

Vanas-Patayah Shanti-Vishwed Devah Shanti-Brahma Shantih,
Sarvag-Wam Shantih Shanti-Reva Shantih Sa Ma Shanti-Redhi॥

Om Shantih Shantih Shantih Om॥
mantras.title: Shanti Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Tatpurushaya Vidmahe Mahadevaya Dheemahi Tanno Rudrah Prachodayat

Om Sarveswaray Vidmahe Shulhastaay Dheemahi Tanno Rudrah Prachodayat

Om Panchvaktray Vidmahe Sahastraakshay Mahadevay Dheemahi Tanno Rudrah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Shiv Rudra Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Mrityunjay Pareshaan Jagadaabhayanaashan
Tav dhyaanen devesh mrityupraapnoti jeevati

Vande ishaan devaay namastasmai pinakine
Aadimadhyaant rupaay mrityunaasham karotu me

Namastasmai bhagwate kailasachal vaasine
Namobrahmendra rupaay mrityunaasham karotu me

Trayambakaya namastubhyam panchasyaay namo namah
Namo dordandachaapaay mam mrityum vinaashay

Namordhendu swarupaay Namo digvasanaay cha
Namo Bhaktarti hantre cha mam mrityum vinaashay

Devam mrituvinaashanam bhayaharam saamrajya mukti pradam
Nana bhutagananvitam divi padaih devaih sada sevitam

Agyaanaandhakanaashanam shubhkaram vidhyaasu saukhya pradam
Sarv sarvapati maheshwara haram mrityunjay bhaavaye
mantras.title: Shiva Aahvaan Mantra

mantras.content:
Durga Durgarti Shamani Durgapadvinivarini ।
Durgamachthini Durgasadhini Durgashini ।
Durgatodwarini Durg Nihantree Durgamaapahan ।
Durgam Gyanada Durgadayatilokdavanala ।
Durgama Durgamaloka Durgamataswarpini ।

Durgamarprada Durgamavidya Durgamashrita ।
Durgamgyanasasthana Durgamadhyanabhasini ।

Durgamoha Durgamga Durgamarthwarpini ।
Durgamasurashanantri Durgamayudharadhini ।

Durgamangi Durgamata Durgamya Durgameshwari ।
Durgabhima Durgabhama Durlabha Durgadharini ।

Namavali Mamayastu Durgaya Mam Manas: ।
Pathet Sarvam Bhayanumukto Bhavishyati Na Sanshayah ।
mantras.title: Shri Durga Dwatrinshat Nam Mala Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Devkinandanay Vidhmahe Vasudevaay Dheemahi Tanno Krishna Prachodayath

Om Dhamodharaya Vidhmahe Vasudevay Dheemahi Tanno Krishna Prachodyat

Om Shri Krishnay Vidhmahe Damodaray Dheemahi Tanno Vishnu Prachodyat
mantras.title: Shri Krishna Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Maatah Sohamupastitosmi Puratah Poorvapratigyan Smaran,
Pratyashravi Purahi Tenty Samaye Praptun Samipan Tav ।
Grahagrasamishadyaya Hyanumatasturyashraman Praptuvan,
Yatprityai Ch Samagatohamadhuna Tasyai Jananyai Namah ॥

Broote Matrsama Shrutirbhagavati Yadbarhadaranyakai,
Tatwan Bestyatti Matrumanch Pitramanacharyavanityasou ।
Tatradau Kil Matrusikshanbidhin Sarvottaman Shasati,
Poojyatpoojyataran Samarthayati Yaan Tasyai Jananyai Namah ॥

Amba Taat Iti Svashikshanavashaaduchcharanaprakriyaan,
Ya Soote Prathaman Kv Shaktirih No Matustu Shikshaan Vina ।
Vyutpattin Kramashashch Sarvajanikin Tattatpadaartheshu Ya,
Hyadhatte Vyavaharamapyavakilan Tasyai Jananyai Namah ॥

Ishtanishtahitaahitadidhishanahauna Vayan Shaishave,
Kithan Sushkulavit Karin Dadhato Bhakshyasaya Balishah ।
Matra Varitsahasah Khalutto Bhakshanyabhakshyani Wa,
Vyagyasishm Hitahite Ch Sutaran Tasyai Jananyai Namah ॥

Aatmagyanasamarjanopakaranan Yaddehayantran Viduh
Tadrogadibhayanmrigorgaripuvratadavanti Swayam ।
Pushnanti Shishumadaradgurukulan Prapayy Kalakramat
Ya Sarvagyashikhamanin Vitanute Tasyai Jananyai Namah ॥

- Shri Shankaracharya Krutan
mantras.title: Shri Mathru Panchakam

mantras.content:
Nrusingh Kavacham Vakshye Prahladanoditan Pura ।
Sarvarakshakaran Punyan Sarvopadravanashanan ॥
Sarvasampatkaran Chaiv Swargamoksaprakarikam ।
Dhyaatva Nrsinhan Deveshan Hemasinhasanasthitan ॥

Vivrtasyan Trinayanan Sharadindusamaprabhan ।
Lakshmyalingitavamangam Vibhootibhirupashritan ॥

Chaturbhujan Komalangam Svarnakundalashobhitan ।
Urojashobhitoraskan Ratnakeyooramudritan ॥

Taptakaanchanasankaashan Pitanirmalavaasanan ।
Indraadisuramaulisthasphuranmaanikyadiptibhi: ॥

Viraajitapadadvandvan Shankhachakraadihetibhi: ।
Garutmata Ch Vinayat Stooyamanan Mudanvitan ॥

Svahrtakamalasanvaasam Krtva Tu Kavacham Pathet
Nrsinho Me Shir: Paatu Lokarakshaatmasambhav: ।
Sarvagopi Stambhavaas: Phaalan Me Rakshatu Dhvanan ।
Narasinho Me Drshau Paatu Somasooryaagnilochan: ॥

Shrti Me Paatu Naraharirmunivaryastutipriy: ।
Nasan Me Sinhanasastu Mukhan Lakshmimukhapriy: ॥

Sarvavidyaadhip: Paatu Nrsinho Rasanaan Mam ।
Vaktran Patvinduvadan: Sada Prahladavandit: ॥

Nrusingh: Patu Me Kanthan Skandhau Bhoobharanaantakrt ।
Divyastrashobhitabhujo Nrsinh: Paatu Me Bhujau ॥

Karau Me Devavarado Nrsinh: Paatu Sarvat: ।
Hrdayan Yogisaadhyashch Nivaasan Paatu Me Hari: ॥

Madhyan Paatu Hiranyaakshavaksh:kukshividaaran: ।
Nabhin Me Paatu Nrhari: Svanaabhibrahmasanstut: ॥

Brahmandakotay: Katyaan Yasyasau Paatu Me Katin ।
Guhyan Me Paatu Guhyaanaan Mantraanaan Guhyarupadhrt ॥

Uru Manobhav: Paatu Jaanuni Nararoopadhrt ।
Janghe Paatu Dharaabhaaraharta Yosau Nrkesari ॥

Suraraajyaprad: Paatu Paadau Me Nrharishvar: ।
Sahasrashirsha Purush: Paatu Me Sarvashastanun ॥

Mahora: Purvat: Mahogr: Paatu Mahaaviraagrajognit: ।
Mahaavishnurdakshine Tu Mahaajvaalastu Nirrutau ॥

Pashchime Paatu Sarvesho Dishi May Sarvtomukh: ।
Nrusinh: Paatu Vaayavyaan Saumyaan Bhooshanavigrah: ॥

Ishanya Patu Bhadro Me Sarvamangaladaayak: ।
Samsarabhayad: Patu Mrityumurthurnrkeshri ॥

Idan Nrsinhakavachan Prahlaadamukhamanditan .
Bhaktimaany: Pathennityan Sarvapaapai: Pramuchyate ॥

Putravan Dhanavan Loke Dirghayurupajayate ।
Yanyan Kamayate Kamam Tamtam Prapnotyasansyam ॥

Sarvatr Jayavaapnoti Sarvatr Vijayi Bhavet ।
Bhumyantarikshadivanan Grahanan Vinivaranan ॥

Vrshchikoragasambhootavishapaharanan Paran ।
Brahmarakshasayakshanaan Durotsaranakarnan ॥

Bhoorje Va Taalapatre Va Kavachan Likhitan Shubhan ।
Karamoole Dhrtan Yen Siddhyeyu: Karmasiddhay: ॥

Devasuramanushyeshu Svan Svamev Jayan Labhet ।
Ekasandhyan Trisandhyan Va Ya: Pathenniyato Nar: ॥

Sarvamangalamaangalyambhuktin Muktin Ch Vindati ।
Dvaatrinshatisahasraani Paathaachchhuddhaatmabhirnrbhi: ।
Kavachasyaasy Mantrasy Mantrasiddhi: Prajaayate ।
Aanen Mantraraajen Krtva Bhasmaabhimantranam ॥

Tilakan Bibhryaadyastu Tasy Grihabhayam Haret ।
Trivaran Japamanastu Dattan Vaaryabhimantry Ch ॥

Praashayedyan Naran Mantran Nrsinhadhyaanamaacharet ।
Tasy Roga: Pranashyanti Ye Ch Syu: Kukshisambhava: ॥

Kimatr Bahunokten Nrsinhasadrsho Bhavet ।
Manasa Chintitan Yastu Sa Tachchaapnotyasanshayan ॥

Garjantam Gurjayatam Nijabhujapatlam Sphotyantan
Harantam Dipyantam Tapayantam Divi Bhuvi Ditijan Kshapeyant Rasantam ।
Krudant Roshyantam Dishidishi Satatam Sambhrantam Harantam ।
Bikhyamtam Ghurnyantam Karnikarstaidivyasingh Namami ॥
॥ Iti Prahladaproktan Narasinhakavachan Sampurnamm ॥
mantras.title: Shri Narasimha Kavacham Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Ugram Veeram Mahavishnum Jwalantm Savrtomukhm ।
Narasimha Bheeshanm Bhadram Mrityumrityam Namamyaham ॥
mantras.title: Shri Narasimha Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Dashrathye Vidmahe Sita Wallabhay Dheemahi Tanno Rama Prachodayat
Om Bharatagrajaay Vidmahe Sitawallabhay Dheemahi Tanno Ramah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Shri Ram Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Ram Ram Ram Ram Naam Tarakam
Ram Krishna Vasudev Bhakti Mukti Dayakam
Ram Ram Ram Ram Naam Tarakam
Ram Krishna Vasudev Bhakti Mukti Dayakam

Janaki Manoharam Sarvalok Naikam
Janaki Manoharam Sarvalok Naikam
Janaki Manoharam Sarvalok Naikam

Sankaradi Sevayam Punynama Kirtanam
Sankaradi Sevayam Punynama Kirtanam

Ram Ram Ram Ram Naam Tarakam
Ram Krishna Vasudev Bhakti Mukti Dayakam

Veershur Vanditam Ravanadi Nashkam
Veershur Vanditam Ravanadi Nashkam

Anjaneya Biography Rajamantra Rupakam
Anjaneya Biography Rajamantra Rupakam

Ram Ram Ram Ram Naam Tarakam
Ram Krishna Vasudev Bhakti Mukti Dayakam
mantras.title: Shri Rama Nama Tarakam

mantras.content:
Om Bhrigujaay Vidmahe Divya dehaay Dheemahi Tanno Shukra Prachodayat

Om Bhriguputraay Vidmahe Shwetwahnaay Dheemahi Tanno Kavi Prachodayat

Om Bhriguwanshjatay Vidmahe Shwetwahnay Dheemahi Tanno Shukra Prachodayat
mantras.title: Shukra Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Nama Om Vishnu-padaya Krishna-preshthaya Bhu-tale,
Srimate Bhaktivedanta-svamin Iti Namine.
Namas Te Sarasvate Deve Gaura-vani-pracarine,
Nirvisesha-sunyavadi-pascatya-desa-tarine.
mantras.title: Srila Prabhupada Pranati Mantra

mantras.content: Om Aadityaya vidmahe diwakaraya dhimahi tanno surya prachodayat ||
mantras.title: Surya Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Aadityasya Namaskaran ye kurventi dine dine |
Aayu pragya bal veerya tejastesa cha jayate ||

Om Maitreya Namaha
Om Ravaye Namaha
Om Suryaya Namaha
Om Bhanave Namaha
Om Khagaya Namaha
Om Pushne Namaha
Om Hiranyagarbhaya Namaha
Om Marichaye Namaha
Om Adityaya Namaha
Om Savitre Namaha
Om Arkaya Namaha
Om Bhaskaraya Namaha
mantras.title: Surya Namaskar Mantra

mantras.content:
Svasti Prajabhyah Paripalayantam
Nyayena Margena Maheem Maheeshah ।
Gobrahmanebhyah Subham Astu Tityam
Lokah Samastah Sukhino Bhavantu ॥
Om Shanti Shanti Shanti।
mantras.title: Svasti Prajabhyah Paripalayantam Mantra

mantras.content:
Om Tulsidevye Cha Vidmahe Vishnupriyaye Cha Dheemahi Tanno Vrinda Prachodayat
Om Tripuray Vidmahe Tulsi Patray Dheemahi tanno Tulsi Prachodayat
mantras.title: Tulsi Mata Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Vakra-Tunndda Maha-Kaaya,
Suurya-Kotti Samaprabha ।
Nirvighnam Kuru Me Deva,
Sarva-Kaaryessu Sarvadaa ॥
mantras.title: Vakratunda Mahakaya Ganesh Shlok Mantra

mantras.content: Om Jal Bimbaay Vidmahe Nil Purushay Dheemahi Tanno Varuna Prachodayat
mantras.title: Varuna Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Venkatachala Nilayam Vaikuntha Purvasam
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Shanka Chakradhar Chinmaya Roopam
Venkatachala Nilayam Vaikuntha Purvasam
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Shanka Chakradhar Chinmaya Roopam

Ambujodbhav Vinutan Aganit Gun Naaman
Tumburu Narad Ganavilolan

Venkatachala Nilayam Vaikuntha Purvasam
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Shanka Chakradhar Chinmaya Roopam

Makar Kundaladhar Madanagopalan
Bhakt Poshak Shri Purandar Vithalan

Venkatachala Nilayam Vaikuntha Purvasam
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Pankaj Netram Param Pavitram
Shanka Chakradhar Chinmaya Roopam

Venkatachala Nilayam
mantras.title: Venkatachala Nilayam Vaikuntha Purvasam

mantras.content:
Vidya Dadati Vinayam,
Vinaya Dadati Paatrataam।
Paatratva Dhanamaapnoti,
Dhanaat Dharmam Tatah Sukham॥
mantras.title: Vidya Dadati Vinayam Mantra

mantras.content: Om Surya Putraay Vidmahe Mahakalay Dheemahi Tanno Yamah Prachodayat
mantras.title: Yama Gayatri Mantra

mantras.content:
Yeshan Na Vidya Na Tapo Na Danam,
Jyanam Na Shilam Na Guno Na Dharmah ।
Te Martyaloke Bhuvi Bharabhutah,
Manushyarupena Mrrigashcharanti ॥
mantras.title: Yeshaan Na Vidya Na Tapo Na Danan
